text: Eunice Lam Yin-nei (; 31 January 1943 â€“ 4 June 2018) was a Hong Kong writer, columnist, businesswoman, and socialite. She was called the "prodigal daughter" of Hong Kong. She published more than eighty books, many of which have been adapted into films. She also wrote regular columns for the newspaper Ming Pao. Lam was married to Peter Lee, brother of the kung-fu star Bruce Lee.
